name: ToggleGroup
purpose: Represent and manipulate a set of persistent on/off states using button-like controls.

stateModel.single: Exactly one option may be active at a time
stateModel.multiple: Multiple options may be active simultaneously

rules: All options are visible at once
Options should be limited in number
visualRules: Toggle items visually resemble buttons but behave as stateful controls
Outline variant is preferred for neutral state selection
doNotUseWhen: Navigating between pages or content sections (use Tabs or Link)
aiHints: Use ToggleGroup when the user should be able to see and change active states at a glance
Do not use ToggleGroup for one-off actions
If the choice affects content hierarchy, prefer Tabs
